reference.unstructured: Council Regulation (EU) 536/2014 of 16 April 2014 on clinical trials on medicinal products for human use, and repealing Directive 2001/20/EC [2014] OJ L 158/1, Article 90. This reflects the prohibition in Article 13 Oviedo Convention, to which some EU Member States are party.
Council Regulation (EC) 1394/2007 of 13 November 2007 on advanced therapy medicinal products and amending Directive 2001/83/EC and Regulation (EC) No 726/2004 [2007] OJ L324/121.

reference.author: MC Cornel

title: Gene therapy regulation: could in-body editing fall through the net?
